verses.name: Isaiah 14:13
verses.text: For thou hast said in thine heart, I will ascend into heaven, I will exalt my throne above the stars of God: I will sit also upon the mount of the congregation, in the sides of the north:

verses.name: Isaiah 14:14
verses.text: I will ascend above the heights of the clouds; I will be like the most High.

verses.name: Isaiah 14:15
verses.text: Yet thou shalt be brought down to hell, to the sides of the pit.

verses.name: Isaiah 14:16
verses.text: They that see thee shall narrowly look upon thee, and consider thee, saying, Is this the man that made the earth to tremble, that did shake kingdoms;
